duties_responsibilities.duty: Create alignment and manage execution of a product vision, strategy, and roadmap for a portfolio of data replication capabilities.
Lead, mentor, and develop a high-performing Product Management team.
Lead research into customer, industry and market trends; identify emerging opportunities; and translate them into concrete proposals.
Hold the team & peers accountable for excellence in decision making, execution, and launch of product features.
Engage directly with customers and present on product vision & capabilities at industry conferences.
Translate complex technical challenges & requirements into tangible business impacts & outcomes for a less technical or executive audience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field (Master's preferred)
